title: Negative Ip
body: I had around 3800 ip, that is more than enough to buy Leblanc, and i did purchase her but straight after i did my ip dropped to -2620 riot please i dont want to have to play games just to get up to 0 ip

replies.body:
LOL WUT

That's just insane lol.

[Submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), they should be able to help you out.
